name: Classic Cotton T-Shirt

description: Modern slim fit jeans crafted from premium denim. Versatile style that works for both casual and smart-casual occasions.

description: Versatile button-down shirt in breathable cotton blend. Perfect for office or weekend wear.

name: Comfortable Hoodie
description: Cozy fleece hoodie with kangaroo pocket. Perfect for layering and casual comfort.

name: Elegant Floral Dress
description: Beautiful floral print dress with a flattering A-line silhouette. Perfect for special occasions and everyday elegance.

name: High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
description: Flattering high-waisted skinny jeans with stretch comfort. A wardrobe essential for modern women.

name: Silk Blouse
description: Luxurious silk blouse with elegant draping. Perfect for professional and formal occasions.

name: Cozy Cardigan
description: Soft knit cardigan perfect for layering. Comfortable and stylish for any season.

description: Colorful graphic t-shirt made from soft, kid-friendly cotton. Perfect for active play and everyday wear.

description: Durable and comfortable shorts designed for active kids. Easy-care fabric that stands up to play.

name: Adorable Summer Dress
description: Sweet summer dress with playful patterns. Comfortable fit that's perfect for special occasions.

name: Warm Winter Jacket
description: Insulated winter jacket to keep kids warm and cozy. Water-resistant with fun color options.
